title: 19 New American Poets of the Golden Gate
description: This 19 New American Poets of the Golden Gate, represents the best writing in America today. This is an extraordinary anthology. In addition to the poetry---some of it new, some previously published--each poet has written an essay to precede the poem. The essays are about the writing and reading of poetry, the intent, the influences, the life behind the work.
author: Philip Dow
